destination_account_alias.description: CLC alias for the destination account

destination.description: The list of destination addresses for traffic on the terminating firewall. This is required when state is 'present'

enabled.description: Whether the firewall policy is enabled or disabled

source.description: The list  of source addresses for traffic on the originating firewall. This is required when state is 'present"

state.description: Whether to create or delete the firewall policy

location.description: Target datacenter for the firewall policy

source_account_alias.description: CLC alias for the source account

wait.description: Whether to wait for the provisioning tasks to finish before returning.

ports.description: The list of ports associated with the policy. TCP and UDP can take in single ports or port ranges.

firewall_policy_id.description: Id of the firewall policy. This is required to update or delete an existing firewall policy
